pname: It Ends With Us : Sometimes The One Who Loves You Is The One Who Hurts You The Most
description: It Ends with Us is a romance novel by Colleen Hoover, published by Atria Books on August 2, 2016. Based on the relationship between her mother and father.

pname: Red Queen 4-Book Hardcover Box Set: Books 1-4
description: Red Queen is a young adult fantasy novel written by American writer Victoria Aveyard. Published in February 2015, it was her first novel and first series. Aveyard followed up with three sequels: Glass Sword, King's Cage and War Storm.

pname: A Court of Thorns and Roses Paperback Box Set (5 books)
description: A Court of Thorns and Roses is a new adult fantasy novel series by American author Sarah J. Maas, beginning with the novel of the same name, released in May 2015.
The Bridge Kingdom is an exciting new fantasy series from USA Today bestselling author Danielle L Jensen.

pname: Air Awakens: The Complete Series Hardcover - 12 August 2020
description: Air Awakens is a five part YA/fantasy series written by author Elise Kova

pname: It Starts With Us Paperback - 18 October 2022
description: It Starts with Us is a romance novel by Colleen Hoover, published by Atria Books on October 18, 2022. It is the sequel to her 2016 best-selling novel It Ends with Us

pname: Ikigai: The Japanese secret to a long and happy life [Hardcover]
description: We all have an ikigai. It's the Japanese word for ‘a reason to live’ or ‘a reason to jump out of bed in the morning’.

pname: Harry Potter Box Set: The Complete Collection
description: A beautiful boxed set containing all seven Harry Potter novels in paperback. These are the new editions of the classic and internationally bestselling, multi-award-winning series
H. D. Carlton is an International and USA Today Bestselling author. She lives in Ohio with her partner, two dogs, and cat.

pname: War of Lanka (Ram Chandra Series Book 4) Paperback
description: LANKA WILL BURN. DARKNESS WILL PERISH. BUT CAN LIGHT ENDURE? INDIA, 3400 BCE.Greed. Rage. Grief. Love. Smouldering tinder, waiting to trigger a war.

pname: Shatter Me - The Complete Collection (9-Book Boxset) Paperback
description: The most popular YA fantasy of 2021 by Tahereh Mafi
The book follows the entire story of Percy, a boy set in modern times who discovers he is a demi-God, Son of Poseidon
